channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- PDF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- PDF

item.title: CVE-2017-0023|2024-08-05T12:47:57.575Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- pdf
item.description: The PDF library in Microsoft Edge; Windows 8.1; Windows Server 2012 and R2; Windows RT 8.1; and Windows 10, 1511, and 1607 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF file, aka "Microsoft PDF Remote Code Execution Vulnerability."
